posts.post_title: T205 R. Hoblitzell  Cinn.  Name Mispelled
posts.post_content: For Sale   T205  Richard Hoblitzell   Name mispelled on back along with Cinn--check scans---PSA stated evid trim---I dont see it--I measured it and card is right--but who knows---Psa also stated no stats on back in the plastic holder they sent it back to me--and they got that wrong---so right now I am looking for $125 or best offer---paypal gift or check works   thanks,  Don
